Text: Iche̩wñ kʼakache̩ʼka kwane̩ ef ume̩, abe̩k ano̩naʼka, kʼi la dʼujiwe abe̩k e̩wñ uno̩ʼka ñw e̩,
tak ujiwe abe̩k e̩wñ uno̩ kʼi ka ñw e̩ wache̩, tak i aka ñw e̩ kakini, Wa, kʼa tʼamo̩jo̩ omune̩ kʼame̩ ma ma ma n ubi, kʼa re̩ ma,
uwe̩ ki netirʼo̩la akache̩ le̩ abe̩k ano̩na le̩ n; todu Jihofa O̩jo̩-me̩ ajʼume̩ ma le̩, kʼi ma abe̩k ame̩ fe̩do̩ Jihofa O̩jo̩-me̩ kpai e̩do̩-me̩ chaka kpai onugo-me̩ chaka.
Ame̩ ki lule̩ tu Jihofa O̩jo̩-me̩ ubi, ku me̩ la railo owñ, ku me̩ de uko̩ uko̩-wñ ku me̩ ki la gba omu-wñ gbo̩, me̩ rʼo̩ ku me̩ la jimʼo̩.

Tak ama ki dʼakache̩ le̩ abe̩k ano̩na le̩ kpa, todabu kʼi ko̩la erʼume̩ da ubi bi Jihofa O̩jo̩-me̩ kʼi mʼume̩ ko kwʼane̩ Ijipti, kʼi la mʼume̩ gba kwef unyi adu le̩ te̩, kʼi kʼe̩ e̩che̩ bʼo̩na ki Jihofa O̩jo̩-we̩ ñwa ñw e̩ kʼe̩ lule̩ efu-wñ te̩. Abe̩le̩ oñ uwe̩ akʼe̩wñ e̩bie̩ne̩ rinyo̩ bʼef ume̩ te̩.

Iche̩wñ kʼo̩maye-we̩ e̩ne̩ke̩le̩ kʼuwe̩ kpʼowñ nʼiye abe̩k o̩ma-we̩ e̩ne̩ke̩le̩, abe̩k o̩ma-we̩ onobule̩, abe̩k o̩ya ki mʼe̩ e̩do̩, abe̩k onuku-we̩ kʼi dab onugo o̩la-we̩ ñw e̩, chane̩ egbʼe̩ ibe umaja maja, kakini, Lewa, kʼa nyʼache amo̩jo̩ omune̩, e-kʼuwe̩ tʼamata-we̩ ma ma ma n,
owñ chʼamo̩jo̩ amone̩ ku ma lʼume̩ daka-i, dagba ma me̩rʼuwe̩ dagba ma jʼo̩na jiji, akwo ukpoji ile̩ o̩wo̩ʼka gbogbo tʼotitala ile̩ o̩wo̩ ekeji,
uwe̩ ki je̩ n, e̩ ki la netirʼu n, e̩ ki liʼu ejumomi n, e̩ ki la do̩wo̩mʼo̩ n, e̩ ki la dʼu maja n;
chai ekpa e̩ dʼu kpa; o̩wo̩ e-we̩ akadʼo ejodudu e̩gba ku ma kpa, ubile̩ tak o̩wo̩ amone̩ chaka akadʼo.
Uwe̩ ki la kʼokuta ro̩ dʼo kʼi ku, todabu kʼi tene efʼuwe̩ fa ubi bi Jihofa O̩jo̩-we̩ kʼi dʼe̩ kwʼane̩ Ijipti wa, kwef unyi adu le̩ te̩.
Tak abo Israe̩l du agbo̩, oñ ma arailo, taku ma ñʼache e̩wñ e̩bie̩ne̩ abe̩le̩ alumeji-we̩ ge̩ n.
Iche̩wñ kʼe̩ dʼef ewo-we̩ʼka ki Jihofa O̩jo̩-we̩ du ñw e̩ kʼe̩ dodo o̩mo̩, kʼe̩ gbo̩ kakini,
Ame̩nebili iche̩ka kwʼalumeji-me̩ dufu, ku ma la fʼabo ewo-ma fa wʼubi, kakini, Lewa, kʼa nyʼare̩ amo̩jo̩ omune̩ kʼame̩ ma ma ma n;
mak uwe̩ ki nitele-wñ, kʼe̩ la atejane̩, kʼe̩ tene o̩bie̩ o̩bie̩; e̩ la go, iche̩wñ ki dʼabe̩le̩, ka ku ma fʼe̩wñ ihie̩ne̩ abe̩le̩ che alumeji-we̩ ochochi,
uwe̩ ki nʼalu ugbada gwo abo ewo le̩ da chuu, kʼe̩ la mʼu ko jo̩ ñw O̩jo̩ hioko, e̩ne̩ du kʼi dʼefu-wñ kpai ame̩la-ma abe̩re̩me̩le̩, e̩ ki nʼalu ugbada che.

Tak uwe̩ ki mʼane̩ kʼogu le̩ je̩ kowa jʼalumeji ojukpologu-wñ, tak e̩ nʼuna gu ewo le̩ kpai ane̩-wñ chaka jo ñwu Jihofa O̩jo̩-we̩ hioko; oñ o̩mo̩ le̩ amud ugbudu dago ogbegbele̩, ma ñʼako unyi o̩mo̩ ge̩ n.
E̩wñ kʼe̩ kojo̩ le̩ e̩ dʼokate-wñ mʼo̩wo̩-we̩ alo n; todu ki Jihofa ki rida bʼe̩kpuna uwe̩do̩-wñ te̩, kʼi lʼuwe̩ ejumomi, kʼi mo̩la ñw e̩, kʼi la je̩ ñw e̩ wewe nyo̩gba alu kʼi go̩ ñw amata-we̩,
e̩gba kʼe̩ gbʼomu Jihofa O̩jo̩-we̩ gbo̩, kʼe̩ la fʼuko̩-wñ du kʼu nañwa ñw e̩ eñini-i de, kʼe̩ che e̩wñ ki chʼo̩kpakpa eju Jihofa O̩jo̩-we̩.
